description:
Teamwork without email. Asana puts tasks & conversations together, so everything your team is working on and talking about is in one place—instead of scattered across email threads.

Connect with your team for free on your iPhone, iPad, and computer.

Key features:

GET ORGANIZED WITH TASKS
From anywhere in Asana, add tasks quickly for to-dos, reminders, and requests. While using other apps, add links, files, and images directly to Asana.

COMMUNICATE IN ASANA 
Comment directly on tasks, instead of emailing teammates. Get automatic status updates in your Inbox on your team's progress on tasks & projects.

MANAGE THE DETAILS OF TEAMWORK
Add due dates, assignees, followers, details, and files to your tasks.

PLAN YOUR DAY
View and organize your task list every time you open Asana. Preview Today's tasks in your device's Notification Center. 

COMPLETE WORK ON-THE-GO
Swipe right to quickly complete tasks and notify your team that your work is finished.

FREE, UNLIMITED USAGE
Add tasks, projects, comments, and attachments for free—for teams up to 15 people.
releaseNotes:
Added:
- In a list of tasks, swipe left on a task to delete it (or right to complete it)

Fixed:
- Recurring tasks created in the app now recur as expected
- Viewing images attached to tasks is less quirky
- Various small fixes and stability improvements
